name: get_the_awarded_books_of_a_year
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hapi_books.
Tool description: HAPI Books is an API about books. It gives information about thousands of books from all around the world. Search by name, by genre, get the best books by year, and more!
API description: Returns the list of the best books of a year by its winning category.
Each returned book has its Name, Winning Category, Cover Image and more.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the list of awarded books.
